column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Jinya has been by far the best ramen noodle restaurant I have gone to. I have tried several other places such as tiger den and ninja
column2: but this one definitely blows the rest out of the water! The noodles are cooked to perfection and the broth is very milky and flavorful. I have tried several of them but the spicy chicken ramen and fried chicken karaage are definitely my favorite. The extra toppings are a plus
column3: but it can get pretty pricey sometimes. Overall
column4: the restaurant has a great atmosphere with great food. I would definitely recommend this restaurant.
